dcterms:creator: Ritesh Kumar
Atul Kr. Ojha
Shervin Malmasi
Marcos Zampieri
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Facebook posts and comments in English, annotated for aggression classification into three categories: Overtly aggressive, Covertly aggressive, and Non-aggressive.
dcterms:title: Facebook posts and comments (English sub-task)

dcterms:creator: Ritesh Kumar
Atul Kr. Ojha
Shervin Malmasi
Marcos Zampieri
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Facebook posts and comments in Hindi, annotated for aggression classification into three categories: Overtly aggressive, Covertly aggressive, and Non-aggressive.
dcterms:title: Facebook posts and comments (Hindi sub-task)

dcterms:creator: Ritesh Kumar
Aishwarya N. Reganti
Akshit Bhatia
Tushar Maheshwari
dcterms:description: A corpus of Hindi-English code-mixed data annotated for aggression, useful for studying aggression in bilingual contexts.
dcterms:title: Aggression-annotated Corpus of Hindi-English Code-mixed Data
